DataElement.preferredName: Early Childhood Speech Speech And Language Assessment Scale Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: At or near the beginning of a period of time or course of events._A time period that begins at the beginning of the human embryonic stage and continues until the end of adolescence._The exchange of spoken words.:The exchange of spoken words._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds, symbols, or gestures._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
